It is important to express the intent that praising New’s femininity should not involve defining her identity without her approving it. Promoting her gentle side must be done while respecting her true self and using pronouns/definitions she personally accepts.
I insist that honoring NuNew's femininity should never mean redefining his identity without his consent. It is essential to honor his femininity while steadfastly respecting his true identity and label he has embraced.
The key point to highlight is maintaining a balance between acceptance and misunderstanding, as well as between encouragement and distortion, when respecting everyone’s identity.
My main point to express that it is crucial to navigate the delicate balance between acceptance and misunderstanding, and empowerment and misrepresentation when it comes to respecting people’s identity.
